title: 1st October 1949: Mao Zedong declares the establishment of the People’s Republic of China
itunes:summary: The Chinese Communists in the People’s Liberation Army had been fighting the second stage of a long and costly civil war against the Nationalist forces of Chiang Kai-shek, known as the Kuomintang, since shortly after the end of the Second World ...
